item.description:
Meet up is at 9, Karaoke starts at 10. Let's make our presence felt and take over SBC Wednesday's Karaoke Night. Let's have a couple of drinks, chill, and whatever else it takes to have a great time. Paul will be bartending so lets take care of our fellow group member. Hope to see a great turnout. This should be an awesome event. Any car pooling ideas are strongly encouraged to be posted ASAP. See you there!

Christian
item.why: If you're up for some drinks, laughs, and hear people make fools of themselves (like me) on the mic while singing, then this event is for you! Wednesday night is Karaoke night at SBC. Come on down for a good time fun time with other group members.
item.name: Karaoke Night at the SBC in Branford
